original_text: The Lord says, ‘The people in Gaza have done more and more wrong things. So I will certainly punish them. 1: Gaza was a city where the Philistine people lived. They caught my people and they took them away from their homes. They sold them to the people in Edom. The Lord says, ‘The people in Gaza have done more and more wrong things. So I will certainly punish them.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시되 가사의 서너 가지 죄로 말미암아 내가 그 벌을 돌이키지 아니하리니 이는 그들이 모든 사로잡은 자를 끌어 에돔에 넘겼음이라

sentences.original_text: The people in Gaza have done more and more wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 가사에 사는 사람들은 점점 더 많은 잘못된 일들을 했다

sentences.original_text: So I will certainly punish them
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 분명히 그들을 벌할 것이다
